data.description: This 4 bedroom 2 bathroom home in Lake Sarasota boasts 1856 sq ft, a new A/C 2022, Re-pipe 2022 and Reroof 2010.  With some TLC it could be a canvas for creating you perfect space. The open floor plan with privacy fenced backyard and large pool on a quiet cul-de-sac with a circle driveway and ample parking.  Split floorplan with 2 bedrooms and a bath on each end of the home would allow for two bedrooms and a bath to be converted into a large master suite.  Conveniently located close to shopping, dining, beaches and Downtown Sarasota with easy access to the highway.
